# Animate CSS details-summary element without JavaScript

As of 30-Oct-2024 this feature requires enabling "Experimental Web Platform Features" in the chrome://flags/ or using Chrome 131 (the features necessary aren't yet in any other browsers--but the feature is a nice progressive enhancement for Chrome users).
[CSS Weekly's CodePen that shows how to animate the details element](https://codepen.io/ZoranJambor/pen/jOorzPv)
[Kevin Powell's (ripoff?) video about animating the details element](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vzj3jSUbMtI)

### Using JavaScript

A version of animating the `details` tags using JavaScript is here:

-   `E:\luther-backup-2.0\delray\users-thumb-Documents\Projects\client\html-css\ui-examples\accordion-04-detail-summary`
-   The magic JavaScript in this project came this old CSS Tricks article. The JS class it provides is dead simple to use.

tags: with:

